title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Arnhem, Netherlands
description:
Global Day of Code Retreat 2014, November 15 at Luminis Arnhem 
November 15, 2014, is this year's Global Day of Code Retreat (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/). This is a day for us, as developers, to hone our skills, share knowledge, and honor the craft of software engineering. 
Luminis Arnhem will facilitate a coderetreat at our offices in Arnhem. We will provide you with both the facilities and the necessary guidance to get the most out of this day. While we will provide you with exercises and training forms, we remain technology agnostics: you can do your training in any language and tool chain you--and your pair--like. 
What is a coderetreat? 
Coderetreat is a day-­long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. The coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement by providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice away from the pressures of 'getting things done.' 
Program 
09:30 Welcome & introduction 
10:00 3 training sessions: 45m of exercise, 10m retrospective, 5m break 
13:00 Lunch 
14:00 3 training sessions: 45m of exercise, 10m retrospective, 5m break 
16:45 Closing ceremony 
17:00 End 
Contact 
To sign up for this coderetreat, RVSP on this page. 
For anything we should know about (for instance, you're a vegan), email kim.rouwenhorst@luminis.eu (mailto:kim.rouwenhorst@luminis.eu) .
